Teleportation: If teleportation technology existed, I would simply transport myself to the desired location on the other continent.
Space Travel: If space travel technology existed, I would take a spacecraft to the nearest space station and then travel to the other continent via spacecraft.
Underwater Travel: If underwater travel technology existed, I would take an underwater vehicle to the nearest underwater portal and then travel to the other continent via underwater portal.
Time Travel: If time travel technology existed, I would travel back in time to a point before the continents were separated and then travel forward in time to the other continent.
Magic: If magic technology existed, I would use a spell to transport myself to the other continent.
